name: Power Level
description:
Fight for your life in this brand new rogue-like experience!! SUMMARY

You have 5 minutes to explore a randomly generated dungeon and gear up for a tough boss fight. Search for treasure, upgrades, and that glorious EXP in this quick-paced action game!


HOW TO PLAY
  • Move  -  ASDW
  • Attack  -  JKLI
  • Pause  -  Escape
  • More abilites will be learned in game!
